title: [Eastern Harbor, Sandy Peninsula]
description: Flanked by water on three sides, the peninsula ends in a small wall designed to be a breakwater and intended to stop the erosion of the beach.  Loud and persistent, the surf crashes across the sun-kissed sands.

Flanked by water on three sides, the peninsula ends in a small wall designed to be a breakwater and intended to stop the erosion of the beach.  Loud and persistent, the surf crashes across the silvery sands.
